name: part_007
file: tmp_【＃百鬼あやめ４周年記念 ⧸ 3DLIVE】Nakiriayame 4th anniversary　~Hapiness to you ♡~ [mwJGZ8YU7o4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Continuation of the performance for 'Renjou Shika'.
MC section with Nakiri Ayame, Shirakami Fubuki, and Ookami Mio.

subtitles.original: 闇に隠せし恋が凝る　雲の切れ間に灯り指す
subtitles.english: The love hidden in the darkness thickens, light shines through the rifts in the clouds.

subtitles.original: 見つめれば隠してはおけない恋情詩歌
subtitles.english: If I gaze at you, I can't hide this love poem.

subtitles.original: 触れないで抱き寄せてよ
subtitles.english: Don't touch me, just hold me close.

subtitles.original: 素直になれたら五月の闇
subtitles.english: If I could be honest, in the darkness of May...

subtitles.original: 君だけに歌う詩を
subtitles.english: ...the poem I sing only for you.

subtitles.original: 恋した君へと伝うように
subtitles.english: So it reaches you, whom I've fallen in love with.

subtitles.original: 愛した君へと届くように
subtitles.english: So it reaches you, whom I've loved.

subtitles.original: 宵の口よ　徒夜の夢のあとに　燃ゆる　陽炎
subtitles.english: The early evening... after a fleeting night's dream, a burning heat haze.

subtitles.original: 空の鏡　映る君へ　左様に　応じて　ごゆるり
subtitles.english: To you reflected in the sky's mirror, responding as such, please relax.

subtitles.original: ひらりひら　舞い散るよ　言の葉は　捕らえきれず
subtitles.english: Fluttering, fluttering, they dance and fall... the words, unable to be fully captured.

subtitles.original: ひとはひらの　想いすら　月夜の　熱に焦がれ
subtitles.english: Even a single petal of thought yearns for the heat of the moonlit night.

subtitles.original: おぼろげに　染まる月は　不知火に　なれそめ
subtitles.english: The moon, dyed in haziness, begins its acquaintance with the will-o'-the-wisp.

subtitles.original: まるで　寒椿
subtitles.english: Just like a winter camellia.

subtitles.original: この愛を　叶えさせてよ　泡沫の　迷いじゃないと　感じさせて
subtitles.english: Let this love come true, let me feel that it's not a fleeting hesitation.

subtitles.original: 凛と咲く　永久の寒椿　想いの丈を　重ねて
subtitles.english: The winter camellia blooming with dignity for eternity, layering the depths of my feelings.

subtitles.original: 萌え出づる　春隣　探し得ぬ　またいづこ　儚く
subtitles.english: The burning approach of spring, unable to be found, where else? Fleetingly.

subtitles.original: 歌え寒椿　蕾を慈しく　想いを　奏でて
subtitles.english: Sing, winter camellia, cherishing the buds, playing your feelings.

subtitles.original: 眠る　微睡よ　花の数だけ　集めた　淡い想いを
subtitles.english: The slumbering doze... gathering faint thoughts as numerous as the flowers.

subtitles.original: 織り重ねて　綴る明日へ　刹那に　奇跡を　ご所望
subtitles.english: Layering them together, towards the tomorrow I write, desiring a miracle in an instant.

subtitles.original: ひらりひら　なりゆくは　春宵の　情に呑まれ
subtitles.english: Fluttering, fluttering, what resounds is swallowed by the emotions of a spring evening.

subtitles.original: 咲き誇れ　最高潮で　心を　紅く染める
subtitles.english: Bloom in full glory at the climax, dyeing the heart crimson.

subtitles.original: 最期まで　凛枯れて　ただ一途な　愛で
subtitles.english: Until the end, withering with dignity, with only a single-minded love.

subtitles.original: 着飾る　甘い言葉じゃ　本当の　想いは　奥の奥
subtitles.english: Dressed-up sweet words... the true feelings are deep, deep within.

subtitles.original: ただ　君を求め　紅く染めた　心隠す
subtitles.english: Simply seeking you, hiding my crimson-dyed heart.

subtitles.original: ひらりひら　舞いちるよ　侘び寂びを　破る焦燥
subtitles.english: Fluttering, fluttering, they dance and fall... an impatience that breaks the wabi-sabi.

subtitles.original: かぐわせた　言の葉すら　長夜の　中に消え
subtitles.english: Even the scented words disappear into the long night.

subtitles.original: 気づいてよ　霞む月は　すでに　深紅に染まる
subtitles.english: Notice it, the hazy moon is already dyed in deep crimson.

subtitles.original: まるで　寒椿
subtitles.english: Just like a winter camellia.

subtitles.original: この恋を　叶えさせてよ　泡沫の　迷いじゃないと　信じさせて
subtitles.english: Let this love come true, let me believe that it's not a fleeting hesitation.

subtitles.original: 凛と咲く　永久の寒椿　想いの丈を　重ねて
subtitles.english: The winter camellia blooming with dignity for eternity, layering the depths of my feelings.

subtitles.original: うおー！あやめ４周年おめでとうー！
subtitles.english: Whoa! Ayame, congrats on your 4th anniversary!

subtitles.original: ありがとー！やったー！
subtitles.english: Thank you! Yay!

subtitles.original: ４周年！４周年！４周年というわけでね。
subtitles.english: 4th anniversary! 4th anniversary! So, it's the 4th anniversary.

subtitles.original: えー私たち！せーの！いろはにほへと　あやふぶみでーす！
subtitles.english: Eh, we are! One, two! Irohanihoheto Ayafubumi!

subtitles.original: なんかちゃんとこうやって言ったの久しぶりだったね。
subtitles.english: It's been a while since we said it properly like that.
